list.name: Madhu & Padmanabhan
list.content: We had the pleasure of working with Verawood Construction recently for our bathroom renovations and we are thoroughly impressed with their professionalism, expertise and attention to detail. The strongest point of this team was their outstanding communication right from the start till the end. Whether through emails or in-person meetings, they were very responsive and transparent, which made the entire process stress-free. They also respected our home, ensuring the worksite was clean and safe. They finished on time and within budget! We highly recommend this team for anyone in need of quality work and exceptional service—truly a five-star experience!
list.title: Homeowner

list.name: Tom Walker
list.content: Verawood....yeah, they're Very good! They're prompt, polite, professional,and productive. 3 renovated and one new build bathrooms are testimony to there hard, skilled work. They took worry and stress out of the job by always updating and answering any questions we had. Materials, products,styles, colours,tiles, vanities, showers, and bathtubs were all showcased which made choosing easier. Verawood passed on contractor pricing where they were able to. There's other projects we need done - they'll be getting a call from us, absolutely. Thanks again Very good...I mean Verawood!
list.title: Homeowner

list.content: We contracted with Verawood Construction Ltd for our ensuite bathroom renovation involving the replacement of the shower, faucets, vanity, sink, toilet, tile flooring and tile shower walls plus bathroom accessories. Jim provided exceptional service, and the results exceeded our expectations.
